name: Maine Lobster Translator
description:
UPDATED! 3/20/2017 Fixed font colors. Minor revision.
UPDATED! 3/21/2017 Added more lobster sayings!

This fun game simulates translations from your lobster's thoughts (if alive) or it's heroic last words. Simulates errors communicating with the lobster.

Learn fun Maine Lobster facts while simulating communication with lobsters in your proximity. A fun way to teach kids about lobster! A great way to promote both Maine and our prized lobster markets!

Funny game app! Try it today! App supports more than 13,000 android devices!

Rated E for Everyone by the ESRB. View My Ratings Certificate!

For Ages 3+

Easy to use! Kid friendly! Share your lobster's thoughts on social media!

It's free! So please share this link today! Get the app!

No Ads! No spyware, malware or virus! Just good clean old fashioned Maine fun!

Scan the QR Code to open this page on your Android Device! (If your not already on it! LOL)

Find Maine Lobster Translator on Facebook!
